title: We focus on solving core human problems
description: We have distilled our investment thesis into 4 core pillars centered around a human component – the way humans LIVE, MOVE, TRANSACT and WORK.

content.title: Invest
content.description: We invest in strong teams building scalable defensible businesses leveraged by technology. We support founders with an almost obsessive vision to disrupt existing industries, create new ones and improve lives through technology..

content.title: Technology
content.description: We like technology with a problem solving vision as opposed to a solution driven one. We see technology as an enabler rather than an end in itself.

content.title: Solving Problems
content.description: We like to understand why you are the best team/product/business to solve a specific problem. Ideally, you should have an unfair and sustainable advantage that will turn out to be the company’s strongest defensibility.
